title: Create a Loading Animation
description:
Build a spinning loader animation using CSS keyframes.

## Requirements

1. Create a `@keyframes spin` animation:
   - Start at 0deg rotation (from/0%)
   - End at 360deg rotation (to/100%)

2. Style the `.loader`:
   - Width and height: 48px
   - Border: 4px solid #f3f3f3 (light gray)
   - Border-top: 4px solid #3498db (blue)
   - Border-radius: 50% (circle)
   - Apply the spin animation:
     - Duration: 1s
     - Timing: linear
     - Iteration: infinite

## Expected Result

A circular spinner that rotates continuously.

testCases.description: Loader should have blue top border

hints: Use @keyframes spin { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } }
Use border: 4px solid #f3f3f3 for the base circle
Use border-top-color: #3498db to color just the top
